nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures in Colors and Shapes

Star Wars Adventures in Colors and Shapes is a read-along book in Buena Vista Records' Discovery Series. The story involves the Rebel Alliance droids C-3PO and R2-D2 searching for a Fulstar plate of the correct color and shape to help Han Solo complete repairs on the Millennium Falcon. The book was published in 1984, and released in both 33 1⁄3 RPM record and cassette tape formats, including dialogue provided by Anthony Daniels as C-3PO, along with an uncredited voice cast and narrator.
The other book in this series was Star Wars Adventures in ABC.

C-3PO and R2-D2 try to help Han Solo and Chewbacca repair the Millennium Falcon for a Rebel supply run by finding a replacement Fulstar plate, but Threepio keeps getting plates in the wrong color and shape.
